price: 61. Kaadu Nabii Qiisa Qhiyaamah ayrók naharat qaraanak abah yan oobiyyi qhiyaamâ soolo xayyowteemih astá, toysa teetit ma agay-waagitinaay (ma-shakkitina) Nabii Mucammadow yoo kataata keenik ixxic; tirtó gital, ah islaamaninnâ diinih gitay massah yaniy makó sinni iyye Yalli.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَعِلۡمٞ لِّلسَّاعَةِ فَلَا تَمۡتَرُنَّ بِهَا وَٱتَّبِعُونِۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu laʿil'mun lilssāʿati falā tamtarunna bihā wa-ittabiʿūni hādhā ṣirāṭun mus'taqīmun
